text:
*EDNA*

We enable most humane digital conversations between brands and consumers.

The explosive growth of mobile penetration has opened up new gateways for companies to reach out directly to customers. Businesses across industries are now looking to create meaningful, personalized connections with customers across various digital touchpoints. Our journey started in 2005 to help businesses do just that – redefine their customer communications. We started by developing innovative A2P SMS solutions for the banking and insurance industry, and over the years forayed into offering authentication services with IMSI and USSD products.

edna.io

*EDNA Product*

We provide:

- Whatsapp Business
- Viber

- SMS
- Web and Mobile Web Chat

*Chat Center*
- Chat Center
